channel.title: Development on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Development on COTTON

item.title: GaFZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ga08G0121 Gene Symbol: GaFZ Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GbBM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_A07G008330 Gene Symbol: GbBM Gene Name: Beauty Mark Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that GbBM directly targets the promoter of four flavonoid biosynthesis genes to positively regulate petal spot development.

item.title: GbWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that GbWRKY1 is a critical regulator mediating the plant defense-to-development transition during V.

item.title: GhAATF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G0332 Gene Symbol: GhAATF1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhACS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACS1 Gene Name: ACS-like protein Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The GhACS1 gene encodes an acyl-CoA synthetase which is essential for normal microsporogenesis in early anther development of cotton。 Real-time quantitative RT-PCR and northern blot analyses revealed that GhACS1 transcripts were predominantly accumulated in the developing anthers of cotton.

item.title: GhACS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACS2 Gene Name: ACS-like protein Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: To elucidate the roles of genes during anther development, two anther-specific cDNAs (designated GhACS1 and GhACS2) encoding acyl-CoA synthetases (ACSs) were isolated from a cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) flower cDNA library.

item.title: GhACT_LI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D04G0865 Gene Symbol: GhACT_LI1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Gly65Val substitution in an actin, GhACT_LI1, disrupts cell polarity and F-actin organization resulting in dwarf, lintless cotton plants.

item.title: GhACT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A05G040150 Gene Symbol: GhACT1 Gene Name: Genome: HAU-AD1_genome_v1.

item.title: GhADF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhADF1 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: characterized the function of a member of the actin depolymerizing factor (ADF) family in Gossypium hirsutum by down-regulation of the gene (designated as GhADF1) expression in the transgenic cotton plants.

item.title: GhAOC2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A08G004050.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2A Gene Name: allene oxide cyclase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhAOC2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D08G004260.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhAPX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX1 Gene Name: cytosolic ascorbate peroxidase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, a cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) cytosolic APX1 (GhAPX1) was identified to be highly accumulated during cotton fibre elongation by proteomic analysis.

item.title: GhARF16-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_08070 Gene Symbol: GhARF16-1 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhARF17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A06G004210 Gene Symbol: GhARF17 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A05G042500 Gene Symbol: GhARF18 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0304 Gene Symbol: GhARF3 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_59721 Gene Symbol: GhBLH1_3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhBLH1_4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_48024 Gene Symbol: GhBLH1_4 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhBRC1 Gene Name: BRANCHED 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBRC1 has the same function as Arabidopsis BRC1 in repressing axillary bud development.

item.title: GhBZR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0312 Gene Symbol: GhBZR3 Gene Name: Genome: genome version is NBI v1.

item.title: GhCaM7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCaM7 Gene Name: calmodulin-7 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The calcium sensor GhCaM7 promotes cotton fiber elongation by modulating reactive oxygen species (ROS) production.

item.title: GhCesA4-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G0509 Gene Symbol: GhCesA4-2 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhCesA7-3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_405G3965 Gene Symbol: GhCesA7-3 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhCesA8-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D10G0333 Gene Symbol: GhCesA8-2 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhCFE1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCFE1A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCFE1A, a dynamic linker between the ER network and actin cytoskeleton, plays an important role in cotton fibre cell initiation and elongation.

item.title: GhCPK84
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D10G2029 Gene Symbol: GhCPK84 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhCPK93
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G2743 Gene Symbol: GhCPK93 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GHCU
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A11G3380 Gene Symbol: GHCU Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum cup-shaped leaf Genome: [cotton genome (ZJUV2.

item.title: GhCUC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCUC2 Gene Name: CUP-SHAPED COTYLEDON2 Genome: reference genome TM-1 (AD1) genome NAU-NBI Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The miR164-GhCUC2-GhBRC1 module regulates plant architecture through abscisic acid in cotton.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhExp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhExp1 Gene Name: alpha-expansin precursor 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Exp2 polymorphisms associated with variation for fiber quality properties in cotton.

item.title: GhExp2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhExp2 Gene Name: alpha-expansin precursor 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Exp2 polymorphisms associated with variation for fiber quality properties in cotton.

item.title: GhFAD2–3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A11G2814 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2–3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhFAD2–3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D11G3169 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2–3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhFIM2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhFIM2 Gene Name: fimbrin-2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GhFIM2 propels cotton fiber development by enhancing actin bundle formation.

item.title: GhGalT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_62126 Gene Symbol: GhGalT1 Gene Name: β-galactosyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A gene (GhGalT1) encoding a putative β-1,3-galactosyltransferase (GalT) was identified in cotton.

item.title: GhGASL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D04G017310 Gene Symbol: GhGASL3 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 genome (HAU-AD1_genome_v1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHUB2-A Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhHUB2-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHUB2-D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhIQD10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G0420 Gene Symbol: GhIQD10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GhIQD10 promoted resistance to verticillium wilt in cotton.

item.title: Ghir_D05G01221
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D05G01221 Gene Symbol: Ghir_D05G01221 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhKNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhKNL1 Gene Name: KNOTTED1-LIKE Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton KNL1, encoding a class II KNOX transcription factor, is involved in regulation of fibre development.

item.title: GhKNL1_A08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A03G021900 Gene Symbol: GhKNL1_A08 Gene Name: class II KNOX protein 1 Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhKNL1_D08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G198400 Gene Symbol: GhKNL1_D08 Gene Name: class II KNOX protein 1 Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhKNOX2-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_36041 Gene Symbol: GhKNOX2-1 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhMML3_A12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMML3_A12 Gene Name: MYBMIXTA-like transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Small interfering RNAs from bidirectional transcripts of GhMML3_A12 regulate cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhmTERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G0336 Gene Symbol: GhmTERF1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_64719 Gene Symbol: GhMYB1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum genome (AD) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhMYB1 regulates SCW stage-specific expression of the GhGDSL promoter in the fibres of Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GhMYB212
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.007G350500.1 Gene Symbol: GhMYB212 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 212 Genome: Phytozome v.

item.title: GhMYB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB24 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-like protein 24 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Cotton Gene Encoding MYB-Like Transcription Factor (GhMYB24) is Specifically Expressed in Pollen and is Involved in Regulation of Late Anther/Pollen Development.

item.title: GhMYB30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D07G2269 Gene Symbol: GhMYB30 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhMYB30-GhMUR3 affects fiber elongation and secondary wall thickening in cotton.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GhPdBG
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3800 Gene Symbol: GhPdBG Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The plasmodesmata-associated β-1,3-glucanase gene GhPdBG regulates fiber development in cotton.

item.title: GhPSK
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPSK Gene Name: Phytosulfokine-α Genome: Species: Gossypium arboreum Functional Descriptions: A peptide hormone gene, GhPSK promotes fibre elongation and contributes to longer and finer cotton fibre.

item.title: GhSUS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G1309 Gene Symbol: GhSUS2 Gene Name: sucrose synthase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GhUBC2L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G2323 Gene Symbol: GhUBC2L Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhUbox8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0168 Gene Symbol: GhUbox8 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhVIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIP1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor 1 Genome: cotton genome (G.

item.title: GhVQ22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A12G0470 Gene Symbol: GhVQ22 Gene Name: PG-specific valine glutamine 22 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Gland-specific GhVQ22 negatively regulates gland size and affects secondary metabolic accumulation in cotton.

item.title: GhVQ22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D12G0482 Gene Symbol: GhVQ22 Gene Name: PG-specific valine glutamine 22 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Gland-specific GhVQ22 negatively regulates gland size and affects secondary metabolic accumulation in cotton.

item.title: GhWRKY16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0175 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY16 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Our data demonstrate that GhWRKY16 plays a crucial role in fiber initiation and elongation, and that GhWRKY16 phosphorylation by GhMPK3-1 is essential for the transcriptional activation on downstream genes during the fiber development of cotton.

item.title: GhWRKY16-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A06G0179 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY16-A Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhWRKY16-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0175 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY16-D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhYGL1d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_30325 Gene Symbol: GhYGL1d Gene Name: YELLOW-GREEN LEAF Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhYGL1d, a pentatricopeptide repeat protein, is required for chloroplast development in cotton.

item.title: WLIM1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: WLIM1a Gene Name: LIM domain protein LIM-2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Dual Functions of WLIM1a in Cell Elongation and Secondary Wall Formation in Developing Cotton Fibers.
